stimulusHtml: The Tenth Amendment resulted most directly from which of the following?

features.html:
“The powers not delegated to the United States by the Constitution, nor prohibited by it to the States, are reserved to the States respectively, or to the people.”

Tenth Amendment to the United States Constitution, ratified December 1791

choicesHtml: The vision of government articulated in The Federalist papers
Many Anti-Federalists’ concerns about the United States Constitution
New England states’ desire to limit slavery in the Northwest Territory
Efforts to stabilize the finances of the United States and to support industry
